comment: Took him online for summer 2022. Really good at explaining. You should have no problem in his class if you really study and understand every concept.

Professor Sukumar is one of the best math professors I've taken at KSU. He is very reasonable and his lectures are straightforward as you'll learn from it more than the textbook. Make sure to ask him questions about the test as he responds in detail. Do all the homework on time and you'll be set. Study his lecture notes.

I have taken stats 2332 before and he was ridiculously tough. To the point where any material could be used. So I was readily prepared for this class the second time but professor Sukumar made it incredibly easy to understand. There were no trick questions or anything that would leave you confused. Everything was well explained. Take him please.

This is the best professor for stat 2332. In class, he goes over notes with blanks, and before each test he posts a worksheet review which covers all the concepts on the exams. He is very fair with grading and is clear about expectations.

Just do it. He's amazing, helpful, aware, and actually teaches if you need more background or assistance without making you feel like an idiot because guess what? You're here because you DONT KNOW things. That is what school is for and he doesn't make you feel bad for it. Clear objectives, not too much homework, lets use notecard on some tests..YES

Approachable, and caring professor. Minimal homework, Quizzes every few chapters, gives fill in notes, tests are straightforward as it could be. No reason to not do well and end with an A. Doesnt hand you a A, but the notes are so straightforward and impossible to not do well on tests given you study a little.

Great professor who wants his students to succeed. I really enjoyed learning about statistics and probability because the stress was taken out of the course. I could focus on the material more because the workload was so manageable. Pay attention in class and his notes/worksheets and you will do great. Homework was short and sweet.

Went as far as telling us what the BONUS question on the exam would be. Also makes the online homework very short which is nice. Can be a little harsh on grading, but thats because he literally copy pastes verbatim from notes for quizzes & tests. So if you're STILL missing it at that point, you kinda deserve the points off. Very fair professor!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Every teacher should strive to be like Professor Sukumar. The class is easy, because he effectively teaches the material. He presents fill in the blank notes and examples, and these are the tests, so literally all you need to do is remember the material from the notes he provides. Highly recommend taking his class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: TAKE HIS CLASS! Very understanding, caring, and there to help. He drops the lowest quiz grade and you don't have to take the final. Quizzes are lockdown w/ no camera so they are open note and his notes are the best.

Joshua was a great choice for my stat class. He is a student and was very understanding of life. He takes his time to explain everything well and answer any questions. Tests/quizzes are LITERALLY a direct reflection of class and class examples. Will never see things you've never heard of on tests like for other teachers. Can exempt final with an A.

Talks very well (no accent) & makes the material easy to understand. Not a PhD professor (he has a master's), but he explains stuff better than a lot of them. Also super young, so very easy to approach/talk to. Quizzes & tests are easy, and he's very clear about his grading. 1 of the few instructors who makes an effort to make the class low stress!
best teacher i have had in my life. teaches the class so clearly and really cares about his students and wants them to succeed. so many materials if you are struggling. take him!!!

Really nice guy! Super accessible too which I appreciated during the pandemic. I once sent him an email at 1 AM and he responded within 10 minutes. He's very dedicated to his job and wants everyone to succeed. If you do the notes and worksheets, you'll pretty much get an A! Highly recommend him.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I took Professor Sukumar in Fall 2020 and he made statistics fun and easy to learn. He provides many opportunities to understand the material such as lecture videos, Practice questions for each lecture, and test reviews. If you study the material and practice after class, you will get an A. I would recommend taking this class.
